description: Michel, a young recruit transferred to Earth along with Shiro, also ends up assigned to the 08th MS Team. Here, he`s relegated to the unglamorous role of Eledore`s assistant, helping operate the team`s hovertruck and serving as its navigator and machine-gunner. In his spare time, Michel pens long letters to his friend B.B... or is she just a friend?
name: Michel Ninorich
